name: M2BITZ [ 1 x 1 ] (-42,15)
description: A M2bitz is a digital piece of real estate in The Metabitz metaverse that investors can buy to build experiences, business, networking, negotiations on top of. Once you own a M2bitz, you will be able to have all connections through the cannabis market around the world and assets. Each M2bitz is a unique (non-fungible) token laying on the public Ethereum blockchain (ERC-721).
